SELECT m.menu_idx, b.brand_nm_en, m.menu_nm_ko, m.menu_nm_en, m.menu_allergy, m.menu_has_caffeine, m.menu_img_url, COALESCE(( SELECT TO_CHAR(AVG(star_rating.star_rating), 'FM9.0') FROM star_rating WHERE menu_idx = m.menu_idx GROUP BY menu_idx ), '0.0') as menu_star_rating,
( SELECT CASE WHEN count(m.menu_idx) > 0 THEN true ELSE false END AS menu_heart_rating FROM heart_rating WHERE user_idx = #{user_idx} ) AS menu_heart_rating
false AS menu_heart_rating
FROM menu m JOIN brand b ON (m.brand_idx = b.brand_idx) ORDER BY m.menu_nm_ko

SELECT m.menu_idx, b.brand_nm_en, m.menu_nm_ko, m.menu_nm_en, m.menu_desc, m.menu_allergy, m.menu_has_caffeine, m.menu_img_url, COALESCE(( SELECT TO_CHAR(AVG(star_rating.star_rating), 'FM9.0') FROM star_rating WHERE menu_idx = m.menu_idx GROUP BY menu_idx ), '0.0') AS menu_star_rating, ( SELECT count(*) FROM heart_rating WHERE menu_idx = #{menu_idx} ) AS menu_heart_rating, true AS is_clicked_heart, true AS is_clicked_star FROM menu m JOIN brand b ON (m.brand_idx = b.brand_idx) WHERE menu_idx = #{menu_idx}
